A convex quadrilateral $ ABCD$ with area $ 2002$ contains a point $ P$ in its interior such that $ PA = 24$, $ PB = 32$, $ PC = 28$, and $ PD = 45$.  FInd the perimeter of $ ABCD$.\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 4\sqrt {2002}\qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 2\sqrt {8465}\qquad \textbf{(C)}\ 2\left(48 + \sqrt {2002}\right)$\\
$ \textbf{(D)}\ 2\sqrt {8633}\qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 4\left(36 + \sqrt {113}\right)$
